attributes.action: ensure that any relatives of the 7/7 suicide bombers who are seen to be celebrating at the grave of the murderers are rounded up and immediately deported from this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To allow this celebration is to condone an abomination.

rejection.details: Any criminal activity would be a matter for the police.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
